Html:
Something that struck me when I first used RAWR, and immediately struck my friend who tried it for the first time last night - there doesn't seem to be any indication of armour type (cloth/leather/mail/plate) and there doesn't seem to be a way to filter based on armour type. It was particularly noticeable when using the healadin model because a lot of the upgrades in the optimizer were cloth healing gear. While cloth is obviously an option it'd be great if there was a way to filter out all the cloth items without manually going through and deleting each item. Even including the armour type in the tooltip would be a big help because at a glance there is no way to tell what type of armour it is.

Am I missing the option to filter armour types, or is it not included? And if it's the latter is there any chance of adding the feature? It'd be greatly appreciated.
Hey, nope we don't have a filter by armor class at the moment, though we plan to add that in a later version.
Thats great. Looking forward to it. And thanks for such a useful app.
